article.headline: Bucknell 65, Colgate 61
article.story: LEWISBURG, Pa. (AP) -- Justin Castleberry scored 22 points and Bucknell built an early lead and then held on to beat Colgate 65-61 Saturday night. John Griffin added 10 points in the win. Willie Morse scored 19 points, Kyle Roemer 12, and Kendall Chones added 11 points and 10 rebounds for Colgate (9-10, 1-4 Patriot League). Helped by 50-percent (12-for24) shooting in the first half, Bucknell (9-10, 4-1) raced to a 39-25 lead and moved out to a 14-point lead with 5:42 left. Colgate started is comeback and pulled within three points when Morse hit a 3-pointer with three seconds left. But Griffin was fouled and made the first of two free throws in the final second to help seal the win.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
